name: SecKeyUsage
desc: The flags that indicate key usage in the KeyUsage extension of a certificate.

items.name: static var crlSign: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The CRLSign bit is set in KeyUsage extension.

items.name: static var contentCommitment: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The ContentCommitment bit is set in KeyUsage extension.

items.name: static var critical: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The KeyUsage extension is marked critical.

items.name: static var dataEncipherment: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The DataEncipherment bit is set in KeyUsage extension.

items.name: static var decipherOnly: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The DecipherOnly bit is set in KeyUsage extension.

items.name: static var digitalSignature: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The DigitalSignature bit is set in KeyUsage extension.

items.name: static var encipherOnly: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The EncipherOnly bit is set in KeyUsage extension.

items.name: static var keyAgreement: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The KeyAgreement bit is set in KeyUsage extension.

items.name: static var keyCertSign: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The KeyCertSign bit is set in KeyUsage extension.

items.name: static var keyEncipherment: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The KeyEncipherment bit is set in KeyUsage extension.

items.name: static var nonRepudiation: SecKeyUsage
items.desc: The NonRepudiation bit is set in KeyUsage extension.
